src: मुझे लगता है कि लॉ एंड ऑर्डर अब तक के बने सबसे बुरे शो में से एक है.

ref: We went to a dentist who pulled the tooth.

src: अमेलिया ने तय किया कि वह कभी मैक्सिको नहीं जाएगी.
mt: Amelia decided she would never go to Mexico.
ref: Amelia decided to never go back to Mexico.

src: हमने बच्चों से कहा कि ज़रूर सैंटा ने उन्हें बारहसिंगा को खिलाया होगा.
mt: We told the children that Santa had given them a bottle of absinthe.
ref: We told the kids that Santa must have share with the reindeer.

src: वह बहुत शुक्रगुज़ार थी और उसने अपने साथी को पैसे देने का वादा किया.
mt: She was very grateful and promised to pay her friend.
ref: She was so grateful and promised to pay her coworker back.

src: सरकार ने कंप्यूटर लैब के लिए फ़ंड देना ज़ारी रखा.
mt: The government has continued to fund computer labs.
ref: The government continued to fund computer labs.

src: मैंने तय किया कि मैं गेम छोड़ दूँगा.
mt: I decided to drop the game.
ref: I decided to forfeit the game.

src: बच्चे ने पूरे साल प्रैक्टिस की और अगले साल टीम में शामिल हो गया.
mt: The child practiced all year and joined the team next year.
ref: The kid practiced all year and next year he made the team.

src: बच्चे ने तो तुरंत बाद कुत्ते को सहलाया भी.
mt: The child then immediately petted the dog.
ref: The baby even pet the dog right afterwards.

src: मुझे अपना नया हेयर स्टाइल बहुत पसंद आया.
mt: I like my new hairstyle.
ref: I really liked my new hair cut.

src: घर आकर मैंने अपनी मोटरसाइकल साफ़ की.
mt: I cleaned my motorcycle when I got home.
ref: I cleaned my motorcycle after I got home.

src: रयान को निकाल दिया गया।
mt: Ryan was removed.
ref: Ryan got fired.

src: वह आदमी रेस्ट स्टॉप पर रुका और कार से उतर गया।
mt: The man stopped at a rest stop and got out of the car.
ref: The man stopped at the rest stop and got out of the car.

src: जोसिआ घिसट कर अपनी माँ के पास गया और खिलौना ले लिया।
mt: Josia Ghis got up and went to his mother and took the toy.
ref: Josiah crawled to his mother and took the toy.

src: मैं एक कुत्ते को घर ले आया क्योंकि मेरे पास पहले से ही बहुत सारे कुत्ते हैं।
mt: I brought a dog home because I already had a lot of dogs.
ref: I brought a dog home since I have so many dogs already.

src: हालांकि उनके सभी सहपाठी बहुत सहयोगी थे।
mt: However, all their classmates were very cooperative.
ref: All his classmates were very supportive though.

src: मैट और लेक्सी ने प्रोम में बहुत अच्छा समय बिताया।
mt: Matt and Lexi had a great time at the prom.
ref: Matt and Lexi had a great time at prom.

src: उसका दिल टूट गया था ।
mt: His heart was broken.
ref: She was heartbroken.

src: इसके बजाय जॉन ने गाजर खायी।
mt: Instead, John ate carrots.
ref: John had carrots instead.

src: उसने एक कॉल बैक का इंतजार किया, लेकिन उसे फिर कभी जजों की तरफ से कुछ नहीं सुनाई दिया।
mt: He waited for a callback, but he never heard anything from the judges again.
ref: He awaited a call back, but he never heard from the judges again.

src: फिर हम सोफे पर गिर पड़े और दोपहर बाद सो गए।
mt: Then we fell onto the sofa and slept the afternoon away.
ref: Then we collapsed on the couch and slept past noon.

src: ऐली ने कपड़े खरीदने के लिए तीन सौ डॉलर का इस्तेमाल किया।
mt: Ellie used three hundred dollars to buy clothes.
ref: Ally used the three hundred dollars to buy clothes.

src: मैंने महसूस किया कि मेरी साइकिल केवल एक सवार के लिए उपयुक्त थी।
mt: I felt that my bicycle was only suitable for one rider.
ref: I realized that my bicycle had only been suitable for one rider.

src: उन्होंने मुड़ने का फैसला किया।
mt: They decided to turn.
ref: They decided to turn around.

src: एना ने फैसला किया कि वह फिर कभी इतना लंबा इंतजार नहीं करेगी।
mt: Anna decided that she would never wait that long again.
ref: Ana decided never to wait that long again.

src: कार्यकर्ता ने मार्क को उनके संरक्षण के लिए धन्यवाद दिया।
mt: A worker thanked Mark for his protection.
ref: The worker thanked Mark for his patronage.

src: मैं पेंट-बाय-नंबर सेट शुरू करने के लिए इंतजार नहीं कर सकता!
mt: I can't wait to start a paint-by-number set!
ref: I can't wait to to start the paint-by-numbers set!

src: रेक्स को बाथरूम साफ करना बहुत पसंद है।
mt: Rex likes to clean the bathroom.
ref: Rex loves cleaning the bathroom.

src: मैंने अपनी परीक्षा दी।
mt: I passed my exam.
ref: I aced my exam.

src: तस्वीर के बैकग्राउंड में म्यूनिख अच्छा लग रहा था।
mt: The background of the picture looks good in Munich.
ref: Munich looked good in the picture's background.

src: मैंने नीली शर्ट धो दी।
mt: I have washed the blue shirt.
ref: I washed the blue shirt.

src: वह सो गया।
mt: He fell asleep.
ref: He fell asleep.

src: एक शिकारी ने जम्हाई ली और चला गया।
mt: 1 hunter yawned and walked away.
ref: One hunter yawned and walked away.

src: टॉड को खुद पर गर्व है।
mt: Todd is proud of himself.
ref: Todd is proud of himself.

src: मैगी एक नया साथी पाकर खुश थी।
mt: Maggie was happy to have a new friend.
ref: Maggie was happy to have a new companion.

src: हालांकि मेरे पास बात करने के लिए कोई नहीं था।
mt: I had no one to talk to.
ref: I did not have anyone to talk to though.

src: आखिरकार, उसने सभी पुरुषों से नफरत की।
mt: In the end, she hated all men.
ref: Eventually, she hated all men.

src: बॉबी ऊब गया था।
mt: Bobbie was bored.
ref: Bobby was bored.

src: मुझे उम्मीद है कि मैं उस गाने को फिर कभी नहीं सुनूंगा।
mt: I hope I never hear that song again.
ref: I hope to never hear that song again.

src: अल और वैल खाने के लिए बाहर गयीं।
mt: Al and Val went out to eat.
ref: Al and Val went out to eat.

src: काश मुझे और टिकट मिल जाते।
mt: If only I had gotten more tickets.
ref: I wish I had gotten more tickets.

src: डेविड पियानो बजाना सीखता है.
mt: David Piano learns to play.
ref: David learns to play piano.

src: लेकिन अपने सीधे दांत देखकर उसे लगा कि इसका फायदा हुआ है.
mt: But looking at his straight teeth, he thought he had benefited.
ref: But it was worth it when she saw her straightened teeth.

src: अपनी मेहनत के फल के रूप में, जेन ने स्वादिष्ट भोजन किया.
mt: As a result of his hard work, Jen ate delicious food.
ref: Jayne ate a delicious meal from the fruits of her labor.

src: सेथ ने सोचा कि उसे एयर कंडीशनिंग फैक्ट्री में काम मिल जाएगा.
mt: Seth thought he would get a job at the air conditioning factory.
ref: Seth thinks he can find a job at the air conditioning factory.

src: एमी फिर गाड़ी चलाकर स्कूल चली गई.
mt: Amy again drove the car to school.
ref: Amy then drove to school.

src: रॉड उस आग में जलकर मर गया.
mt: Rod was killed in the fire.
ref: Rod died in the fire.

src: बैरी ने वोट दे दिया.
mt: Barry voted.
ref: Barry voted.

src: जॉनी बहुत खुश था कि उसका टायर पंक्चर हो गया.
mt: Johnny was very happy that his tire had a puncture.
ref: Johnny was very happy that he had a flat tire.

src: वह एक छोटे और सस्ते अपार्टमेंट में रहने चली गई.
mt: She moved to a small and cheap apartment.
ref: She moved into a smaller, cheaper apartment.

src: मुझे वह टुकड़ा खाने को मिल गया.
mt: I got a piece to eat.
ref: I got to eat the slice.

src: मे और कैथी में बहुत बनती थी.
mt: Me and Cathy got along very well.
ref: May and Cathy got along greatly.

src: मोनिका को बहुत अच्छा लगा कि उसकी दोस्त ने घर का बने तोहफे की तारीफ की.
mt: Monica was pleased that her friend complimented her on the homemade gift.
ref: Monica was pleased to see her friend admire the homemade gift.

src: संदिग्ध व्यक्ति ने तय किया कि वह खुदको पुलिस के हवाले कर देगा.
mt: A suspect decided to turn himself in to police.
ref: The suspect decided to turn himself in.

src: लेकिन आखिरकार वे साथ आ ही गए.
mt: But eventually they came together.
ref: But eventually they get together anyway.

src: मैं बहुत रोमांचित था.
mt: I was very excited.
ref: I was thrilled.

src: जेक को अपने पिता के साथ फुटबाल गेम देखने में बहुत मज़ा आया.
mt: Jake enjoyed watching the football game with his father.
ref: Jake had a great time at the football game with his dad.

src: मैं गाड़ी चलाकर बीच तक पहुंचा.
mt: I drove to the beach.
ref: I drove to the beach.

src: एमी कॉफ़ी की दुकान पर ही स्कूल जाने लगी.
mt: 5-year-old Amy Coffey started going to school.
ref: Amy started going to school at the coffee shop.

src: स्टीव की पत्नी वह तोहफा देखकर बहुत खुश हुई.
mt: Steve's wife was very happy to see the gift.
ref: Steve's wife was ecstatic about the gift.

src: अब मैं गोल्फ को एक खेल नहीं मानता हूं.
mt: I no longer consider golf a sport.
ref: I no longer consider golf a sport.

src: जॉन अकेले फ़िल्म देखने चला गया.
mt: John went to the movies alone.
ref: John went to the movies by himself.

src: बेन को वह धागा जादुई लग रहा था.
mt: Ben thought the thread was magical.
ref: Ben was fascinated by the string.

src: हुआन को लगा कि लुचाडोर बनने का सपना मूर्खतापूर्ण था.
mt: Juan thought the dream of becoming a Luchador was foolish.
ref: Juan decided that being  luchador was a stupid aspiration.

src: उन्होंने आखिरकार, एक लड़का और एक लड़की का नाम तय किया.
mt: They finally settled on a boy and a girl's name.
ref: They finally decided on one boy name and one girl name.

src: अब सारा वहां जा सकती थी और खाना ले सकती थी.
mt: Now Sara could go there and get food.
ref: Sara was then able to stop by and get food.

src: उन्होंने तय किया कि वे दोनों उस क्लास में लैब पार्टनर बनेंगे.
mt: They decided to be lab partners in that class.
ref: They decide to be lab partners in their class together.

src: रसायनशास्त्र किट पाकर वह खुश था.
mt: He was happy to get the chemistry kit.
ref: He was happy to get the Chemistry set.

src: उसने उस दादागिरी दिखा रही हमिंगबर्ड को आसानी से खा लिया.
mt: He easily ate the hummingbird showing off its daddiness.
ref: It ate the territorial hummingbird easily.

src: लोला को गणित के सवाल का जवाब मिल गया.
mt: Lola got the answer to her math question.
ref: Lo figured the math problem.

src: हमने बाद में तय किया कि हम एक छोटा बैंड शुरू करेंगे.
mt: We later decided to start a small band.
ref: We later decided to start a small band.

src: टायलर उदास हो गया.
mt: Tyler was sad.
ref: Tyler got depressed.

src: वह उत्साहित थी क्योंकि उसे डेंटिस्ट के पास जाना बहुत पसंद था.
mt: She was excited because she liked going to the dentist.
ref: She was excited because she loved going to the dentist.

src: डेरेक ने फिर कभी नहीं पढ़ा.
mt: Derek never read it again.
ref: Derek never read again.

src: मुझे और मेरे दोस्तों को थोड़ी देर बाद बार ने जाने के लिए कहा.
mt: I'll be back in a bit to meet up with my friends.
ref: The bar asked me and my friends to leave after a while.

src: मैंने उसे अकेला छोड़ दिया लेकिन छुप कर नज़रें चुरा कर देखता रहा.
mt: I left him alone but kept looking at him secretly.
ref: I left her alone but kept sneaking little glances.

src: पैट अपनी कार में बैठा और काम पर चला गया.
mt: Pat sat in his car and drove to work.
ref: Pat got in his car and drove to work.

src: ग्रेग ने एक पुलिस रिपोर्ट दर्ज की और उन्होंने आख़िरकार चोर को पकड़ लिया.
mt: Greg filed a police report and eventually caught the thief.
ref: Greg filed a police report and they eventually caught the thief.

src: उसका सप्ताहांत बहुत ख़राब था, लेकिन अपनी प्रेमिका को बताया कि यह बहुत बढ़ियां था.
mt: His weekend was terrible, but told his girlfriend it was great.
ref: He had a miserable weekend, but told his girlfriend it was great.

src: पीट ने वॉलेट रख लिया और पैसे को दान संस्था में दे दिया.
mt: Pete took the wallet and donated the money to a charity.
ref: Pete kept the wallet and donated the money to charity.

src: सैली ने सोचा कि उसकी बहन बेरहम थी.
mt: Sally thought her sister was cruel.
ref: Sally thought her sister was cruel.

src: मेरा बेटा मर गया और हमने उसे कब्रिस्तान में दफ़ना दिया.
mt: My son is dead and we buried him in the cemetery.
ref: My son died and we buried him in the graveyard.

src: टीथिंग बिस्किट को पाकर लोरेली शांत हुई.
mt: Loralei calmed down when she got the teething biscuit.
ref: Lorelei calmed down after getting the teething biscuit.

src: बत्तख़ो ने मुझे बहुत पसंद किया.
mt: Buttaque liked me very much.
ref: The ducks liked me a lot.

src: इसके बाद वह रोज़ाना अपनी सेल्फ़ी स्टिक इस्तेमाल करता था.
mt: After that, he used his selfie stick daily.
ref: He used his selfie stick everyday after that.

src: लुईस ने डांस करना शुरू कर दिया.
mt: Louis started dancing.
ref: Lewis started to dance.

src: सारा ने बहुत उमंग से ख़रीदारी किया.
mt: Sara bought with great enthusiasm.
ref: Sara made the purchase enthusiastically.

src: बिल ने स्कूल के लिए तैयार होना शुरू किया.
mt: Bill started getting ready for school.
ref: Bill started to get ready for school.

src: कुछ समय बाद मार्था एक विशेषज्ञ सीमस्ट्रेस बन गई.
mt: Martha later became a seamstress expert.
ref: Martha became an expert seamstress after a while.

src: दोनों बिल्लियां बहुत स्वस्थ थीं.
mt: Both cats were very healthy.
ref: Both cats were very healthy.

src: वह पहले की तुलना में ज़्यादा गंदी रहने लगी.
mt: It is getting dirtier than before.
ref: It ended up dirtier than it was before.

src: स्वस्थ रहना हमेशा मज़ेदार नहीं होता है.
mt: Being healthy is not always fun.
ref: Being healthy isn't always fun.

src: एन्ना ने घर जाते समय ड्राइव करते हुए सारे विंग्स खा लिए.
mt: Anna ate all the wings while driving home.
ref: Anna ate all the wings as she drove home.

src: मैं अपने भाई के साथ कभी टेलीविजन नहीं देखता.
mt: I never watch television with my brother.
ref: I never watch television with my brother.

src: जब विमान अचानक ठीक हुआ, तो आइवी को राहत की लहर महसूस हुई.
mt: When the plane suddenly leveled off, Ivey felt a wave of relief.
ref: When the plane suddenly corrected, Ivy felt a wave of relief.

src: जोई को अपने आप पर गर्व महसूस हुआ.
mt: Joey felt proud of himself.
ref: Joey felt proud of himself.

src: जॉन ने बेगल को काम पर लाने का फ़ैसला किया.
mt: John hired Begle to work for him.
ref: John decided to bring bagels to work.

src: फ़्रेड ने लॉटरी नहीं जीती.
mt: Fred did not win the lottery.
ref: Fred didn't win the lottery.

src: जीना ने बाथरूम में रखे सारे साबुन को चुरा लिया.
mt: Gene stole all the soap in the bathroom.
ref: Gina stole al the soap that was in the bathroom.

src: फिर उसने उन्हें काम पर वापस जाने के लिए चिल्ला कर कहा.
mt: He then yelled at them to go back to work.
ref: She then yelled for them to get back to work.

src: तब, एम्मी के पिता ने कहा कि वह दोनों बिल्ली के बच्चे रख सकती है.
mt: Then, Amy's father said he could keep both kittens.
ref: Then, Emmy's dad said she could keep both kittens.

src: जिल को एक अच्छी नौकरी मिल गई।
mt: Jill got a good job.
ref: Jill found a nice job.

src: जैरी ने अपने दोस्तों के लिए अपना गिटार बजाने का फैसला किया।
mt: Jerry decided to play his guitar for his friends.
ref: Jerry decided to play his guitar for his friends.

src: काइल को वास्तव में मार्वल हेरोस में दिलचस्पी थी।
mt: Kyle was actually interested in Marvel Heroes.
ref: Kyle was really into Marvel heros.

src: फ्रांसिन खुश थी कि उसने आरामदायक जूते पहने!
mt: France was happy she was wearing comfortable shoes!
ref: Francine was glad that she wore comfortable  shoes!

src: जब मैं बड़ा हुआ, तो मुझे लोगों के सामने कूदना बंद करना पड़ा।
mt: When I was young, I had to stop jumping in front of people.
ref: When I got older, I had to stop jumping out at people.

src: रेचल जानना नहीं चाहती थी कि पत्र में क्या लिखा है।
mt: Rachel didn't want to know what was written in the letter.
ref: Rachel didn't want to know what the letter said.

src: डेब उसी काम पर चली गई जिसमें वह सालों से थी।
mt: Deb was doing the same job she had been doing for years.
ref: Deb went to work at the same job she had been at for years.

src: वह चाहती थी कि यह वापस बढ़े।
mt: She wanted it to go back.
ref: She wished it would grow back.

src: जीना बाहर निकली और पैदल घर वापस चली गई।
mt: She came out and walked back home.

mt: He then chased away the squirrels.
ref: She then scared away the squirrels.

src: मैंने बाइक को धक्का दिया।
mt: I hit the bike.
ref: I pushed the bike over.

src: जीना स्वाभाविक विद्रोही थी।
mt: He was a natural born rebel.
ref: Gina was natural rebel.

src: फिर वे अपने नए घर में चले गए।
mt: Then they went to their new home.
ref: Then they moved to their new house.

src: वह खुश था कि उसके दोस्त उसे भरोसेमंद मानते थे।
mt: He was happy that his friends trusted him.
ref: He was happy that his friends considered him trustworthy.

src: मैंने इसके बजाय खाने के लिए पिज्जा आर्डर किया।
mt: I ordered pizza instead of eating it.
ref: I ordered pizza to eat instead.

src: लौरा को लगा कि उसने अपना समय बर्बाद किया है।
mt: Laura thought she had wasted her time.
ref: Laura felt she had wasted her time.

src: उस मूर्खतापूर्ण स्थिति पर रे हँसा।
mt: 1. That idiotic situation made me laugh.
ref: Ray laughed at the crazy situation.

src: वे अपनी रात के बारे में बात करते हुए घर चली गयीं।
mt: They went home talking about their night.
ref: They went home talking about their night.

src: इसने काम किया और भाषण की तारीफ़ हुई।
mt: It worked and the speech was praised.
ref: It worked and the speech was received well.

src: डॉक्टर ने सुझाव दिया कि जेक इसके बजाय काउन्सलिंग में हिस्सा लें।
mt: Dr. Jek suggested that Jek instead take part in counseling.
ref: The doctor suggested that Jake attend counseling instead.

src: ऐलिस परेशान थी कि उसे चायनीज़ भोजन से समझौता करना पड़ेगा।
mt: Alice was upset that she would have to compromise on Chinese food.
ref: Alice was upset she had to settle for Chinese food.

src: मैंने नूडल्स पकाए।
mt: I cooked noodles.
ref: I cooked the noodles.

src: अंत में उसे वो गैरेज में मिला।
mt: In the end, he found it in the garage.
ref: He finally found it in the garage.

src: उसने घर जाकर रोने का फैसला किया।
mt: He decided to go home and cry.
ref: He decided to go home and cry.

src: वेंडी ने खुशी-खुशी और नहाने का तेल खरीद लिया।
mt: Wendy bought shampoo and conditioner happily.
ref: Wendy happily bought more of the bath oil.

src: उसने दो लेने का फैसला किया।
mt: He decided to take two.
ref: He decided to have two.

src: मेंढक का इतना भरा पेट अपने पूरे जीवन में कभी नहीं हुआ था।
mt: The frog's stomach was never this full in its entire life.
ref: The frog had never had such a full stomach in his entire life.

src: उन्होंने उसे एक मिठाई की ट्रीट दिया।
mt: They gave him a sweet treat.
ref: She gave him a dessert treat.

src: फिर मैं सांप की ओर दौड़ा।
mt: Then I ran towards the snake.
ref: Then I ran towards the snake.

src: वह अपनी जुयें की जीत से खुश था।
mt: He was happy with his win.
ref: He was ecstatic over his gambling wins.

src: मेरी बहादुरी की प्रशंसा करते हुए, वह रोई और मुझे गले लगा लिया।
mt: She praised my bravery, and hugged me to her bosom.
ref: She cried and hugged me, admiring my bravery.

src: मैथ्यू की मां ने कंप्यूटर पर अपना सारा काम खत्म कर दिया।
mt: Matthew's mother finished all her computer work.
ref: Matthew's mother finished all of her work on the computer.

src: टाइन ने किसी के भी बेहतरीन समय से टीम में जगह बनाई।
mt: Tian has made her mark in the team with her best time.
ref: Tine made the team with the best time of anyone.

src: मैंने इसे अनदेखा कर दिया और घर चला गया।
mt: I ignored it and went home.
ref: I ignored it and went home.

src: सुइयों को हटाने और चढ़ाई जारी रखने में 20 मिनट का समय लगा।
mt: 20 minutes was spent removing the parachutes and continuing the climb.
ref: It took 20 minutes to remove the needles and continue climbing.

src: जिम ने लिन को डेट पर जाने के लिए कहा।
mt: Jim asked Lin to go on a date.
ref: Jim asked Lynn on a date.

src: रिले बहुत बेहतर लग रही थी और उसकी अच्छे से तारीफ़ हुई।
mt: The relay was going very well and she was well praised.
ref: Riley looked much better and was well received.

src: ऐन का दिल टूट गया है।
mt: An's heart is broken.
ref: Ann is heart broken.

src: प्रतियोगिता के परिणाम को लेकर आया बहुत खुश थी।
mt: He was very happy with the results of the competition.
ref: Aya was very happy about the outcome of the contest.

src: उसके माता-पिता ने उसे तीन दिन की छुट्टी दी।
mt: His parents gave him three days off.
ref: His parents gave him three days off.

src: एना ने उन पर मुकदमा किया लेकिन उसे कुछ नहीं मिला क्योंकि उनके पास कोई बीमा नहीं था।
mt: Anna sued them but got nothing because they had no insurance.
ref: Anna sued them but got nothing because they had no insurance.

src: डेव बहुत निराश था!
mt: Dave was very disappointed!
ref: Dave was so disappointed!

src: उन्होंने एक नए मुहल्ले में एक अच्छा घर खरीदा।
mt: They bought a good house in a new neighborhood.
ref: They purchased a nice home in a new neighborhood.

src: मेरे पास कोई कंप्यूटर नहीं है।
mt: I have no computer.
ref: I have no computer.

src: सिसल से बनी नई पोस्ट को बिल्ली ने स्वीकार कर लिया।
mt: A new post made of sisal was accepted by the cat.
ref: The cat accepted the new post made of sisal.

src: डेनियल को लिखने से नफरत थी।
mt: Daniel hated writing.
ref: Daniel hated writing.

src: गार्डों ने जेफ से गेंद चुरा ली।
mt: The guards stole Jeff's ball.
ref: The guards stole the ball from Jeff.

src: हम फिर कभी कैंप नहीं डालेंगे।
mt: We will not camp again.
ref: We will never camp again.

src: मुझे बढ़िया डील मिलना अच्छा लगा।
mt: I got a good deal, that's good.
ref: I liked getting a good deal.

src: जॉय को आखिरकार एक नियोक्ता का फोन आया और उसे नौकरी मिल गई।
mt: Joy finally got a call from an employer and got a job.
ref: Joey finally received a call from an employer and got the job.

src: जो ने कुछ नए केबल चैनलों का आर्डर दिया, लेकिन फिर भी वह नाखुश था।
mt: He ordered some new cable channels, but was still unhappy.
ref: Joe ordered some new cable channels, but was still unhappy.

src: उसने अगले दिन ध्यान सिखाना शुरू किया।
mt: He started teaching meditation the next day.
ref: She started teaching meditation the next day.

src: न्या ने रोज वही खाने का फैसला किया।
mt: Nya decided to eat the same thing every day.
ref: Nya decided to eat the same thing everyday.

src: उसने फैसला किया कि आराम ने सहायता की है।
mt: He decided that rest had helped.
ref: She decided rest has helped.

src: टेड अपनी कार में बैठा और घर चला गया।
mt: Ted sat in his car and drove home.
ref: Ted got in his car and drove home.

src: घर के 2 ब्लॉक के भीतर बवंडर आया!
mt: 2 blocks from home, a tornado came!
ref: A tornado came within 2 blocks of the house!

src: मैंने फैसला किया कि मुझे ड्राइंग पसंद नहीं है।
mt: I decided that I don't like drawing.
ref: I decided I didn't like drawing.

src: लिसा को अभी भी विश्वास था कि उसकी पसंद उसे खुश कर देगी
mt: Lisa still believed that her choice would make her happy
ref: Lisa still felt confident that her choice would make her happy.

src: जब उसके माता-पिता ने उसे पकड़ा तो वह फँस गयी।
mt: When his parents caught him, he was stuck.
ref: When her parents caught her she was grounded.

src: बाद में उन्होंने एक चट्टान से सूर्यास्त देखा।
mt: Later they saw a sunset over a rock.
ref: Afterwards they watched the sunset from a cliff.

src: वो आदमी बिल्डिंग डिजाइनर नहीं था।
mt: He was not a building designer.
ref: The Man was not a building designer.

src: उसने देखा कि वह और उसकी बहन कितनी एक जैसी दिखती हैं।
mt: She saw how much they looked alike.
ref: She gawked at how much her and her sister look alike.

src: लिज़ खेल से ऊब गई और झपकी लेने लगी।
mt: Liz got bored with playing chess and started to take naps.
ref: Liz got bored of the game and took a nap.

src: मार्क को काम पर पहुंचने में देर हो गई।
mt: Mark was late for work.
ref: Mark ended up being late for work.

src: एमी बहुत प्रतिबद्ध थी।
mt: Amy was very committed.
ref: Amy was very committed.

src: ब्रायन ने पास्ता खरीदा।
mt: Brian bought pasta.
ref: Bryan bought pasta.

src: एमिली का बच्चा शेरों के करीब चला गया।
mt: Emily's baby ran near the lions.
ref: Emily's child walked closer to the lions.

src: किम ने एक बास्केट स्कोर की और एक पिल्ला मिला।
mt: Kim scored a basket and got a puppy.
ref: Kim scored a basket and got a puppy.

src: टीम के साथ कैरेन में सुधार हुआ।
mt: Team with Karen improved.
ref: Karen improved with the team.

src: कायला ने सोचा कि यह अब तक की सबसे अच्छी डेट थी।
mt: Kayla thought this was the best date ever.
ref: Kayla thought it was the best date she'd ever had.

src: उसे यह जानकर राहत मिली कि वह गलत था।
mt: She was relieved to learn that she was wrong.
ref: He was relieved to find out he was wrong.

src: मेरे पति बहुत आभारी हैं!
mt: My husband is very grateful!
ref: My husband is so grateful!

src: ओनी ने अपने शानदार गायन से टैलेंट शो जीता।
mt: Oney won the talent show with his amazing singing.
ref: Oni won the talent show with his awesome singing.

src: राल्फ की माँ ने उसे मदद करने से इनकार करने के लिए सज़ा दी।
mt: Ralph's mother sentenced him to punishment for refusing to help.
ref: Ralph's mom punishes him for refusing to help.

src: कायला इकलौती संतान थी।
mt: Kayla was an only child.
ref: Kayla was an only child.

src: वह घर वापस गया और बिना रुके सभी फिल्में देखीं।
mt: She went home and watched all the movies without stopping.
ref: He went back home and binge watched all of his movies.

src: लौरा पर तब देश द्वारा महाभियोग लगाया गया था।
mt: Laura was impeached by the country at the time.
ref: Laura was then impeached by the country.

src: चार्ली ने रिशवत लेना शुरू कर दिया.
mt: Charlie started to eat the rishwat.
ref: Charlie started taking bribes.

src: हमारे कुत्ते को असल में घर को अपने सिवा किसी दुसरे के साथ बांटना पसंद नहीं.
mt: Our dog doesn't like to share our home with anyone else.
ref: Our dog really enjoys having the house to himself.

src: शॉन के रूममेट बहुत गुस्सा हो गए कि वह बात सुन नहीं रहा था.
mt: Sean's roommate got mad that he wasn't listening.
ref: Sean's roommates got very angry that he wasn't listening.

src: उसने फिर कभी इस पर चर्चा नहीं की, और डॉक्टर नहीं बनी.
mt: She never spoke of it again, and did not become a doctor.
ref: She never discussed it again, and didn't become a doctor.

src: केली बदल कर सूखे कपड़े पहनने के लिए घर गई.
mt: Kelly changed into dry clothes and went home.
ref: Kelly went home to change into dry clothes.

src: बेन ने अपने दादा से पूछा कि वह दोनों अगली बार कब मछली पकड़ने जा सकते थे.
mt: Ben asked his grandfather when they would go fishing again.
ref: Ben asked his grandfather when they could go fishing next.

src: अमेलिया वापस घर चली गई.
mt: Amelia is back home.
ref: Amelia went back home.

src: लड़के ने सांता से ढेर सारे उपहार मिलने की उम्मीद की!
mt: The boy hoped to get lots of presents from Santa!
ref: The boy hoped to get lots of presents from Santa!

src: जब वह उठा तो कड़ाके की ठंड थी.
mt: When he got up, it was cold and rainy.
ref: When he woke up it was freezing.

src: एंथनी अपनी भाषाई क्षमताओं की वजह से क़ामयाब हो पाया.
mt: Anthony succeeded because of his linguistic abilities.
ref: Anthony became successful because of his linguistic abilities.

src: उसने दो स्कर्ट और एक ब्लाउज़ ख़रीदा.
mt: She bought two skirts and a blouse.
ref: She bought two skirts and a blouse.

src: जोनी अपने भाई से ख़ुश थी.
mt: Johnny was happy with his brother.
ref: Joanie was pleased with her brother.

src: कॉर्नेलिया फिर अपने बिस्तर को वापस वहीं ले गई जहां वह था.
mt: Cornelia returned to her bed where she was.
ref: Cornelia then moved her bed back to where it was.

src: जब वह अपनी मोटरसाइकिल चलाता है तो टिम सुरक्षित महसूस करता है.
mt: When he rides his motorcycle, Tim feels safe.
ref: Tim feels safe when he rides his motorcycle.

src: वेंडी रोते हुए कमरे से बाहर भागी.
mt: Wendy ran out of the room crying.
ref: Wendy ran out of the room crying.

src: टॉम और जेक तब अपने पसंदीदा बैंड को नहीं देख सके.
mt: Tom and Jake didn't get to see their favorite band.
ref: Tom and Jake then could not see their favorite band.

src: लेस्टर ने बिना सेल फ़ोन के अपने जीवन को जारी रखा.
mt: Lester continued his life without a cell phone.
ref: Lester continued his life without a cell phone.

src: बेन अपना तेल बदल वाने में सक्षम था.
mt: Ben was able to change his own oil.
ref: Ben was able to get his oil changed.

src: मैंने घर आकर सीरियल खाया.
mt: I watched a serial at home.
ref: I came home and ate cereal.

src: एन्ना ने जल्द ही मछली को स्टोर में वापस कर दिया था.
mt: Anna quickly returned the fish to the store.
ref: Anna soon returned the fish to the store.

src: ली ने एक पप्पी को अपनाने का फ़ैसला किया.
mt: Lee adopted a puppy.
ref: Lee decided to adopt a puppy.

src: बॉब ने सही में अपनी ख़रीदारी के मज़े लिए.
mt: Bob has enjoyed his purchase indeed.
ref: Bob really enjoyed his shopping trip.

src: जमाल लुईस ने उसे व्यक्तिगत सलाह दी और उसे शुभकामनाएं दीं.
mt: Jamal Lewis gave him personal advice and sent him good wishes.
ref: Jamal Lewis gave him personal advice and wished him the best.

src: उसे रॉबिन की देखभाल करना अच्छा लगा.
mt: It was nice to take care of Robin.
ref: She liked taking care of the robin.

src: मैं अब एक ऐसा करियर बनाने के लिए आज़ाद हूं जो मुझे ख़ुशी देगा.
mt: I am now free to build a career that will make me happy.
ref: I'm now free to pursue a career that will make me happy.

src: ईमानदारी से, मुझे भी सच में नहीं पता था कि क्यों.
mt: To be honest, I didn't even know why.
ref: Honestly, I didn't really know why either.

src: बेन अधिक शुल्क पर नाराज़ था.
mt: Ben was upset about the extra fee.
ref: Ben was frustrated at the extra charge.

src: मुसाफ़िर ने क्रिस को बुनियादी फ़्रेंच बोलना सीखने में मदद की.
mt: The traveler helped Chris learn basic French.
ref: The patron helped teach Chris how to speak basic French.

src: मैंने Google से बहुत कुछ सीखा.
mt: I have learned a lot from Google.
ref: I learned a lot from Google.

src: जब उसे प्रोमोशन दिया गया तो उसे ख़ुशी हुई.
mt: When he was promoted, he was happy.
ref: He was pleased when he was given the promotion.

src: रिट्ज अनाथ हो गया था और उसे एक आश्रय में भेजा जाना था।
mt: Ritz was homeless and was to be sent to a shelter.
ref: Ritz was orphaned and had to be sent to a shelter.

src: मिया का अच्छा समय बीता।
mt: Mia is having a good time.
ref: Mia had a great time.

src: फ्रेड के बॉस ने उसे गले लगा लिया ।
mt: Fred's boss hugged him.
ref: Fred's boss gave him a large hug.

src: उसने और केबल बॉक्स खरीदे।
mt: He bought another cable box.
ref: She bought more cable boxes.

src: विक्टर नियमित रूप से पिस्ता खरीदना शुरू करने का फैसला करता है।
mt: Victor decides to start buying pistachios regularly.
ref: Victor decides to start buying pistachios regularly.

src: उसने एक बियर खोली और एक बड़ा घूँट लिया।
mt: He opened a beer and took a big gulp.
ref: She cracked open a beer and took a swig.

src: उसने अपने पड़ोसी से जम्प-स्टार्ट के लिए कहा।
mt: He asked his neighbor for a jump-start.
ref: She asked her neighbor for a jump-start.

src: आखिरकार टॉम वापस ग्रिड पर चला गया।
mt: Tom finally returned to the grid.
ref: Eventually Tom went back on the grid.

src: टिम ने ये बनने के लिए स्कूल में कड़ी मेहनत की।
mt: Tim worked hard in school to become this.
ref: Tim worked hard in school to become one.

src: हम सभी को लगा कि मेरी बहन इस तरह के कपड़े पहने प्रफुल्लित दिख रही है।
mt: We all thought that my sister was looking happy wearing such clothes.
ref: We all thought my sister looked hilarious dressed up that way.

src: फ्रेड ने अपने स्टॉक खरीद पर खेद व्यक्त किया।
mt: Fred expressed regret over his stock purchases.
ref: Fred regretted his stock purchase.

src: जेन ने स्पेलिंग बी जीत ली!
mt: Jen wins spelling bee!
ref: Jen won the spelling bee!

src: केली को आगंतुक पसंद हैं।
mt: Kelly likes visitors.
ref: Kelly loves to have visitors.

src: उसने समुद्र तट पर बहुत अच्छा समय बिताया।
mt: 1. He had a great time at the beach.
ref: She had a wonderful time on the beach.

src: एंड्रयू ने इच्छा की कि उसके माता-पिता के पास शराब होती।

mt: In the end, he decided to buy white eggs instead.
ref: He finally decided to buy white eggs instead.

src: उन सभी ने एक साथ बहुत यादगार वक़्त बिताया.
mt: They all spent a very memorable time together.
ref: They all had a very memorable time together.

src: मैगी ने कभी पांडा नहीं देखा था.
mt: Maggi never saw a panda.
ref: Maggie has never seen a panda.

src: वियाना अब रोज़ काम करती है.
mt: Vienna is working again.
ref: Vianna now works everyday.

src: हमने बहुत अच्छा वक़्त बिताया.
mt: We had a great time.
ref: We had a great time.

src: दोनों ने अपनी पिछली भूमिकाओं में वापस जाने का फ़ैसला किया.
mt: Both have decided to return to their previous roles.
ref: They both decided to go back to their previous roles.

src: लीना ने अपने बच्चों को ढेर में से कपड़े निकाल कर पहनाए.
mt: Leena dressed her children in clothes she pulled from the rubble.
ref: Lina made her kids wear clothes from the pile.

src: एना ने सोचा के चॉकलेट शेक का स्वाद बहुत ख़राब है.
mt: Anna thought the chocolate shake tasted awful.
ref: Anna thought the chocolate shake tasted dreadful.

src: मैंने गैस स्टेशन पर चिप्स खरीदने का सोचा.
mt: I was thinking of buying chips at the gas station.
ref: I decided to buy chips at the gas station.

src: टॉमी ने गिटार बजाना शुरू किया.
mt: Tommy started playing the guitar.
ref: Tommy started playing guitar.

src: जिल के माता-पिता ने उसे क्लॉस छोड़ने के लिए डांटा.
mt: The boy's parents scolded him for leaving class.
ref: Jill's parents scolded her for skipping class.

src: एलेक्स ने अपने डॉक्टर की अपॉइन्ट्मन्ट छोड़ दी.
mt: Alex skipped his doctor's appointment.
ref: Alex skipped his doctor's appointment.

src: क्रिस ने लाल रंग की गाड़ी ख़रीदी.
mt: Chris bought a red car.
ref: Chris bought the red car.

src: लंबी, भूरे बालों वाली लड़की ने गेम जीत लिया.
mt: A long-haired girl won the game.
ref: The tall, brown haired girl won the game.

src: हेनरी ने स्कैवेंजर हंट नहीं खेलने का फ़ैसला किया.
mt: Henry decided not to play scavenger hunt.
ref: Henry decided not to do the scavenger hunt.

src: वो दोनों बहुतहिम्मती बन गए और बहुत से मित्र भी बना लिए.
mt: They both became very brave and made many friends.
ref: They both became more confident and made more friends too.

src: आखिरकार जब उसने आयरलैंड के लिए प्रस्थान किया तो वह बड़ा उत्साहित था।
mt: Finally, when he departed for Ireland, he was very excited.
ref: He was thrilled when he was finally on his way to Ireland.

src: आग बुझाने वाले यंत्र से उसने स्थिति संभाली।
mt: He managed the situation with the fire extinguisher.
ref: He used a fire extinguisher to save the day.

src: बेथ एकदम स्वादिष्ट मैश्ड आलू बनाने के लिए संकल्पित थी।
mt: Beth was determined to make delicious mashed potatoes.
ref: Beth was dedicated to making great mashed potatoes.

src: उनके माता पिता ने मिलकर इसकी खुशी मनाने के लिए एक बड़ी पार्टी दी।
mt: Their parents threw a big party to celebrate.
ref: Their parents jointly threw them a huge party to celebrate.

src: उसने वेस्टर्न फिल्म का खूब आनंद लिया।
mt: He enjoyed Western films a lot.
ref: He enjoyed watching the western.

src: मैं खुश और आरामदायक महसूस कर रहा था।
mt: I felt happy and comfortable.
ref: I was relaxed and happy.

src: एश्ली का कुत्ता पिस्सू से भरा था।
mt: Ashley's dog was infested with fleas.
ref: Ashley's dog was full of live fleas.

src: मुझे स्पघेटी पसंद नहीं है।
mt: I don't like spaghetti.
ref: I hate spaghetti.

src: उन्होंने मुझे सुझाव दिया कि मुझे मेरे बाल छोटे कर लेने चाहिए।
mt: They suggested that I should cut my hair short.
ref: They helped me realize that I should cut my hair short.

src: केली बहुत खुश थी!
mt: Kelly was very happy!
ref: Kaylee was thrilled!

src: नील बहुत दुखी था।
mt: Neil was very sad.
ref: Neil was miserable.

src: जब दाखिला मिलने का पहला पत्र उसे मिला तो वह खुशी से रो पड़ी।
mt: When the first letter offering him admission arrived, he was so happy he burst into tears.
ref: She cried of joy when she received her first acceptance letter.

src: अब वह हर बार चालू हो जाता है।
mt: Now it turns on every time.
ref: Now it comes on every time.

src: मेरे प्रोफेसर बहुत निराश थे।
mt: My professor was very disappointed.
ref: My professor was very upset.

src: उन्होंने गाड़ी किराए पर ली और स्कीइंग का आनंद उठाया।
mt: They rented a car and enjoyed skiing.
ref: They rented a car and had a wonderful time skiing.

src: ब्रैड की माँ उसकी बहुत देखभाल करती थी।
mt: Brad's mother took very good care of him.
ref: Brad's mother was very caring.

src: उसे एक होमेलेस शेल्टर में जगह लेनी पड़ी।
mt: She had to take a homeless shelter.
ref: He had to go to a homeless shelter.

src: वह दोस्तों के कहे हुए से भी ज़्यादा गहरा तैरा।
mt: He swims deeper than his friends' said.
ref: He swam even farther out then his friends dared him too.

src: हुआन की माँ ने उसे टाको कैसरोल बनाना सिखाया।
mt: Juan's mother taught him how to make tamales.
ref: Juan's mother showed him how to make a taco casserole instead.

src: लीना स्कूल गई लेकिन उसे पता चला कि उसके दोस्त भी बीमार हैं।
mt: Lena went to school but found out that her friends were also sick.
ref: Lena went to school only to find out her friends were sick.

src: जिम की पत्नी ने निर्णय लिया कि उसे दूध से बनी चीज़ें खाना चाहिए।
mt: Jim's wife decided that she should eat cheese made from milk.
ref: Jim's wife decided he should have a dairy-rich diet.

src: टिम को अच्छा लगा कि लैम्प को सेट अप करना इतना आसान था।
mt: Tim liked that it was so easy to set up the lamp.
ref: Tim was pleased the lamp was so easy to set up.

src: चोट की वजह से वह ट्राइआउट में भाग नहीं ले सकी।
mt: He was unable to compete in the triathlon due to his injuries.
ref: She could not participate in the tryout with the injury.

src: टामी ने जीना को तब तक बुली किया जब तक वह रोने नहीं लगी।
mt: Tommy called Jeanie a bully until she started crying.
ref: Tami bullied Gina until Gina started crying.

src: मॉर्गन खुश थी कि उसे अपने साथ एक्सट्रा टी बैग्स लाना याद था।
mt: Morgan was happy that she remembered to bring extra tea bags with her.
ref: Morgan was glad she remembered to bring extra tea bags with her.

src: उसे कपकेक पसंद आया।
mt: He likes cupcakes.
ref: She loved the cupcake.

src: उसने पहले स्थान हासिल किया।
mt: He won first place.
ref: He finished in first place.

src: मॉल कि पुलिस द्वारा टेसर किए जाने के बाद बॉब कभी उबर नहीं पाया।
mt: Bob never recovered after being tested by mall police.
ref: Bob was never the same after being tasered by the mall cops.

src: आइडा खुश थी कि वह फ़ैस्टिवल में बारिश में नाच पा रही थी।
mt: Ida was happy that she was dancing in the rain at the festival.
ref: Ida was glad she could dance in the rain at the festival.

src: वो सब लोग बाथरूम में बने रहे जब तक बवंडर शांत नहीं हो गया।
mt: Everyone stayed in the bathroom until the tornado calmed down.
ref: They huddled in the bathroom as the tornado raged overhead.

src: चार्ल्स के लिए यह एक अच्छे रिश्ते की शुरूआत थी.
mt: It was a good start to a relationship for Charles.
ref: It was the beginning of a fruitful relationship for Charles.

src: घर आकर उसने अकेले वह केक खाया.
mt: He ate the cake by himself when he got home.
ref: She ate the cake alone at home.

src: रॉन ने पाया कि उसे खेत में रहना अच्छा लगता है.
mt: Ron found that he liked living on the farm.
ref: Ron found that he rather enjoyed living on a farm.

src: रॉन को स्टोर ने ईनाम दिया.
mt: 7-Eleven awarded Ron.
ref: Ron was given a prize by the store.

src: हमने साथ में बैंड में बजाना बंद कर दिया.
mt: We stopped playing together in the band.
ref: We stopped playing in a band together.

src: जैक ने पिल्ला लेने का विचार पूरी तरह से छोड़ दिया.
mt: Jack had completely given up the idea of getting a puppy.
ref: Jack abandoned the whole idea of getting a puppy.

src: एमी के पापा बास्केटबॉल में उसे हरा देते थे.
mt: Her father used to beat her at basketball.
ref: Amy's dad beat her at basketball.

src: जॉन फिर माइक्रोस्कोप से कीटाणुओं को देखने लगा.
mt: John then looked at the microbes through the microscope.
ref: Jon then watched germs with his microscope.

src: क्लर्क ने उसे बेकन की जगह बताई.
mt: The clerk told him it was bacon.
ref: The clerk told him where the bacon was located.

src: जिमी हँसने लगा.
mt: Jimmy started laughing.
ref: Jimmy laughed.

src: जो खज़ाना मिला, उसने उसे फ़ेंक दिया.
mt: What he found, he flung away.
ref: He threw away the treasure he found.

src: मुझे मेरी माँ का खरीदा हुआ कोई भी सामान पसंद नहीं आया.
mt: I don't like any of the things my mother bought.
ref: I didn't like any of the groceries my mom bought.

src: माइक को अपना भरोसेमंद दोस्त स्पॉट बहुत पसंद है.
mt: Mike likes his spotter, Mike, very much.
ref: Mike loves his faithful friend Spot very much.

src: जो ने ग्रांट को कुछ पैसे उधार दिए.
mt: Who lent Grant some money.
ref: Joe loaned Grant some money.

src: काफ़ी समय के बाद, वह ठीक से कोडिंग करना सीख गया.
mt: After a long time, he finally learned to code properly.
ref: After a long time, he learned to code properly.

src: झींगा मछली खाना राकेश को सबसे कम पसंद है.
mt: Rakesh dislikes eating prawns the most.
ref: Lobster was Rakesh's least favorite food.

src: मेरे पापा ने फिर मेरे लाइसेंस के लिए आवेदन करवाया.
mt: My father applied for my license again.
ref: My dad then took me to get my license.

src: रॉन बहुत खुश था.
mt: Ron was very happy.
ref: Ron was very happy.

src: उसने तब तक नहीं सुना, जब वसंती में एक दिन बहुत सारी चीटियाँ आ गईं.
mt: He didn't notice until a day in spring when a lot of cheetahs came.
ref: He didn't listen until we got a lot of ants one spring.

src: ब्रैड ने स्वादिष्ट एग्स बेनेडिक्ट खाया.
mt: Brad ate delicious eggs Benedict.
ref: Brad had delicious Eggs Benedict.

src: पाउलो अपने किए पर शर्मिंदा था.
mt: Paulo was ashamed of what he had done.
ref: Paulo was ashamed of what he did.

src: पैट्रिक को इस घटना के कारण कुत्तों से डर लगने लगा.
mt: Patrick began to fear dogs because of this incident.
ref: Patrick developed a fear of dogs because of the incident.

src: मैं खुद से बहुत नाराज़ थी.
mt: I was very upset with myself.
ref: I was so angry at myself!

src: अब मैं पहले से बहुत स्वस्थ हूँ.
mt: I am much healthier now than I was before.
ref: I am much healthier now.

src: केली खुशी से कूद पड़ी.
mt: Kelly was delighted to jump.
ref: Kelly jumped for joy.

src: जेन की गर्लफ़्रेंड की फूलों पर जान देती थी.
mt: Jen's girlfriend was suicidal over flowers.
ref: Jane's girlfriend was a die-hard flower lover.

src: माइकल खुद से निराश हो गया.
mt: Michael was disappointed in himself.
ref: Michael was disappointed in himself.

src: डेमन सीधे अपने कमरे में गया और सो गया.
mt: Demon went straight to his room and went to sleep.
ref: Damon went straight to his room and went to bed.

src: डेविड और मिआ ने फ़िल्म बीच में छोड़ने का तय किया.
mt: David and Mia decided to drop out of the film mid-way.
ref: David and Mia decided to leave the movie.

src: बॉब की बेटी ने स्वादिष्ट खाने के लिए दादी का शुक्रिया किया.
mt: Bob's daughter thanks grandma for delicious food.
ref: Bob's daughter thanked Grandma for the delicious meal.

src: सूजी को उम्मीद थी कि बिल्ली पेड़ में रहेगी।
mt: Suzie thought the cat would stay in the tree.
ref: Suzi hoped the cat would stay in the tree.

src: अवा ने एक्वेरियम का सारा पानी टॉयलेट में बहा दिया।
mt: Ava flushed the aquarium's entire water supply into the toilet.
ref: Ava flushed all the aquarium water down the toilet.

src: दूसरे थिएटर के लिए गैस का खर्चा ज्यादा आता है।
mt: 2nd theater is more expensive for gas.
ref: It costs more for gas to the other theater.

src: मैंने कार से छुटकारा पाने का फैसला किया।
mt: I decided to get rid of my car.
ref: I decided to get rid of the car.

src: उसने प्रतियोगिता जीती और उसे खुद पर गर्व था।
mt: She won the competition and was proud of herself.
ref: She won the contest and was proud of herself.

src: फिर वह लेट गई और झपकी लेने लगी।
mt: She then lay down and took a nap.
ref: Then she lay down and took a nap.

src: पिल्ले के मालिक ने मैट को इसे खोजने के लिए एक इनाम दिया।
mt: The owner of the puppy offered a reward for finding Matt.
ref: The puppy's owner gave Matt a reward for finding it.

src: माइक को बाइक चलाना पसंद नहीं था।
mt: Mike didn't like riding a bike.
ref: Mike didn't like riding bikes.

src: लुसी ने महसूस किया कि भोजन जल गया था।
mt: Lucy noticed that the food had burned.
ref: Lucy realized the meal was burned.

src: टिम के शिक्षक ने उसके चौकन्नेपन की प्रशंसा की।
mt: Tim's teacher praised his alertness.
ref: Tim's teacher praised his attentiveness.

src: एमी ऑपरेटर के साथ सबसे अच्छी दोस्त बन गई।
mt: She became the best friend of the operator of the Amy.
ref: Amy became best friends with the operator.

src: वह अपने छिन्न-भिन्न कंप्यूटर से निराश था।
mt: He was frustrated with his broken computer.
ref: He was disappointed in his broken computer.

src: उन्हे मालिक कभी नहीं मिला और कुत्ते को पाल लिया।
mt: He never met the owner and raised the dog.
ref: They never found the owner and kept the dog.

src: बिल हर दिन अभ्यास करके प्रसन्न था।
mt: Bill was happy every day practicing.
ref: Bill was happy to practice every day.

src: बाद में कार्लोस ने अपने घुटने पर पट्टी बांध दी।
mt: Later, Carlos tied his knee with a bandage.
ref: Afterwards Carlos puts a bandage on his knee.

src: लांस की पत्नी को घर पहुंचने पर बहुत ही रोमांटिक और प्यार भरा महसूस हुआ।
mt: When Lance got home, his wife felt very romantic and loving.
ref: Lance's wife felt very romantic and loving when she arrived home.

src: कीथ ने बर्गर और फ्राइज़ ऑर्डर किया।
mt: Keith ordered a burger and fries.
ref: Keith ordered a burger and fries.

src: लिआ स्पेनिश बोलना भूल गई।
mt: Liya forgot how to speak Spanish.
ref: Leah forgot how to speak Spanish.

src: दो घंटे के बाद दमकल ने आकर जे को बचाया।
mt: 2 hours later, the fire department arrived and rescued the jet.
ref: After two hours firefighters came and rescued Jay.

src: उस पर पीडोफिलिया का आरोप लगाया गया और उसे जेल भेज दिया गया।
mt: He was charged with pedophilia and sent to jail.
ref: He was accused of pedophilia and sent to prison.

src: टेड के दोस्तों ने सोचा कि वह अभियान में निर्विरोध हिस्सा लेगा।
mt: Ted's friends thought he would be an automatic part of the campaign.
ref: Ted's friends thought he would run in the campaign uncontested.

src: वह दोपहर भर गेंद से खेलती रही।
mt: She played with the ball all afternoon.
ref: She continued playing with the ball all afternoon.

src: हमने मामा को बुरा भला कहा कि उसने क्या किया।
mt: We have told our mother that she did what she did.
ref: We cursed Mama for what she'd done.

src: बॉब हमेशा लापरवाह रहा था।
mt: Bob was always careless.
ref: Bob had always been reckless.

src: कार्ल ने अपने बेटे को बाइक देने का फैसला किया।
mt: Carl decided to give his son a bike.
ref: Carl decided to give the bike to his son.

src: वह वापस गई और हिरण के मांस की एक और बड़ी सर्विंग ली।
mt: She returned and had another large serving of deer meat.
ref: She went back and had another large serving of deer meat.

src: वह एक वैज्ञानिक बन गया।
mt: He became a scientist.
ref: He ended up becoming a scientist.

src: जूली बहुत ही शर्मिंदा थी।
mt: Julie was very embarrassed.
ref: Julie was incredibly embarrassed.

src: जेम्स ने शीर्ष 50 में खत्म किया।
mt: James finished in the top 50.
ref: James finished in the top 50.

src: मुझे तब पता था कि मैं एक पेशेवर साइकिल चालक बनना चाहता हूं।
mt: I knew I wanted to be a professional cyclist.
ref: I knew then that I wanted to become a professional cyclist.

src: शिक्षक ने उन्हें बात करना बंद करने के लिए कहा।
mt: The teacher told them to stop talking.
ref: The teacher told them to stop talking.

src: डेनियल ब्रेकर बॉक्स चेक करने गया।
mt: Daniel Breaker went to check the box.
ref: Daniel went to check the breaker box.

src: मुझे उम्मीद थी कि वह मुझे सिर्फ एक चेतावनी देगा।
mt: I expected that he would just warn me.
ref: I hoped he would just give me a warning.

src: मेलिसा की मां ने अपने बेटे को जल्दी सुलाने का सुझाव दिया।
mt: Melissa's mother suggested she put her son to bed early.
ref: Melissa's mother suggested putting her son to bed earlier.

src: मार्क ने अच्छा प्रदर्शन नहीं किया और खुद को हारा हुआ महसूस किया।
mt: Mark did not perform well and felt defeated.
ref: Mark did not do well and felt defeated.

src: रेक्स खुद का आनंद लेता है।
mt: Rex enjoys himself.
ref: Rex enjoys himself.

src: वह ऑर्गन को घर ले गया और उसे खूबसूरती से बजाना सीखा।
mt: He brought the organ home and learned to play it beautifully.
ref: He took the organ home and learned to play it beautifully.

src: उन्होंने कुछ मछलियाँ खरीदीं।
mt: They bought some fish.
ref: They bought some fish.

src: उन्होंने अपने प्यालों को बर्फ से भर दिया।
mt: They filled their cups with ice.
ref: They filled their cups with ice.

src: वह अपने नए कछुए से प्यार करती थी।
mt: She loved her new turtle.
ref: She loved her new turtle.

src: बच्चों ने इसके बजाय लुका-छिपी खेलने का फैसला किया।
mt: Instead, the children decided to play hide-and-seek.
ref: The children decided to play hide and go seek instead.

src: फ्रांसिस्को एक एकाउंटेंट बन गया।
mt: Francisco became an accountant.
ref: Francisco became an accountant.

src: उसने पाइनकोन को पेड़ों से लटका दिया और पक्षियों की प्रतीक्षा करने लगी।
mt: He hung the pinecone from the trees and waited for the birds.
ref: She hung the pinecones from the trees and waited for the birds.

src: यह हमारा नया पसंदीदा रेस्टोरेंट होगा।
mt: This will be our new favorite restaurant.
ref: This would be our new favorite restaurant.

src: उसका पेट भरा हुआ था और वह खुश थी।
mt: His stomach was full and he was happy.
ref: She was full and happy.

src: उनके कोई संतान नहीं थी।
mt: He had no children.
ref: They had no children.

src: जीना की शिक्षिका ने उसे बताया कि वह अपने फोन का इस्तेमाल कर सकती है।
mt: The teacher at Jena told her she could use her phone.
ref: Gina's teacher told her she could use her phone.

src: जिल खुश थी कि वह डॉक्टर के पास गई।
mt: Jill was happy that she went to the doctor's.
ref: Jill was glad she went to the doctor.

src: तब उसने महसूस किया कि यह शनिवार था।
mt: Then he realized it was Saturday.
ref: Then she realized it was Saturday.

src: सारा दर्द से कराह उठी।
mt: She cried out in pain.
ref: Sara cried out in pain.

src: पैट हर समय आने-जाने में बर्बाद हुए अपने समय के बारेसोचता है।
mt: Pat is always thinking about the time he wastes going back and forth.
ref: Pat thinks about all the time he wasted commuting.

src: टॉड के घुटने कांपने लगे क्योंकि वह नर्वस था।
mt: Todd's knees began to shake as he was nervous.
ref: Todd's knees shook as he skated because he was nervous.

src: जोन अपने रूममेट में निराश थी।
mt: Jon was disappointed in his roommate.
ref: Joan was disappointed in her roomate.

src: वर्कआउट खत्म करने के बाद उन्होंने नहाया।
mt: After finishing their workout, they took a shower.
ref: He showered after he finished working out.

src: उसने ठंडा होने के लिए अपनी जैकेट उतार दी।
mt: He took off his jacket to cool down.
ref: She took off her jacket to cool off.

src: नीना ने अपनी कमाई से एक नई बाइक खरीदी।
mt: Nina bought a new bike with her earnings.
ref: Nina bought a new bike with her earnings.

src: टैमी चाहती थी कि जीना चुप हो जाए, लेकिन वह बस बोलती रही।
mt: Tammy wanted Gina to be quiet, but she just kept talking.
ref: Tami wished Gina would shut up, but she just kept talking.

src: हैरी ने जल्दी से अपनी माँ की समस्या का समाधान किया।
mt: Harry quickly solved his mother's problem.
ref: Harry quickly fixed the problem for his mother.

src: मुझे दूसरों की मदद करना अच्छा लगता है।
mt: I like to help others.
ref: I like helping others.

src: केविन स्टेसी से बहुत नाराज था।
mt: Kevin was very angry with Kevin.
ref: Kevin was very angry with Stacy.

src: हालांकि, यह सिर्फ गैस बन जाने से था।
mt: However, it was just a fuel spill.
ref: However, turns out to just be gas.

src: अगर यह इतना आसान काम नहीं होता तो वह छोड़ देती।
mt: If this were not so easy a job, I would have left it.
ref: If it wasn't such easy work she would have quit.

src: मेरे पिताजी हमेशा सुरक्षित गाड़ी चलाते थे और हम जल्दी पहुँच जाते थे।
mt: My father always drove safely and we arrived quickly.
ref: My dad always drove safely and we arrived quickly.

src: गिल और पीटर फॉक ने एक-दूसरे के लिए आपसी नफरत साझा की।
mt: Gil and Peter Fock shared mutual hatred for each other.
ref: Gill and Peter Falk shared a mutual hatred for each other.

src: उन्होंने आखिरी वाले को नहीं खोया, लेकिन फिर भी निराश थे।
mt: He didn't lose the last one, but he was still disappointed.
ref: He did not miss the last one, but was still disappointed.

src: उसकी धोखेबाज पत्नी ने अफेयर जारी रखा।
mt: His unfaithful wife kept the affair going.
ref: His cheating wife continued the affair.

src: इवान खुश था कि यात्रा इतनी अच्छी तरह से समाप्त हुआ।
mt: Ivan was happy that the journey ended so well.
ref: Ivan was happy the hike ended so well.

src: पैगी ने बर्फ में खेलने का फैसला किया,
mt: Peggy decided to play in the snow,
ref: Paige decided to play in the snow,

src: जॉन परेशान था कि उनके पास इतना खराब समय था।
mt: John was upset that he had so little time.
ref: John was upset that they had such an awful time.

src: उस आदमी को संगीत पसंद नहीं था।
mt: That man did not like music.
ref: The man did not like music.

src: मैगी खुश थी कि लाइन में इंतज़ार इतनी कम थी।
mt: Maggie was happy that the line was so short.
ref: Maggie was glad that the wait in line was so short.
